name: Final Habitica VII 3.1.7
description: Final Habitica VII for Habitica based on the Final Fantasy menu.
additional_info:
Screenshots: 
Pets   - http://imgur.com/zrtrwSW
Mobile - http://imgur.com/lI9pxTX
Dark   - http://imgur.com/Mgewrkk

Reward Items:
# Item: Phoenix Down
# Description: Regain lost level
# Price: 3000
![phoenixdown](http://i.imgur.com/8l13Tqm.png) Phoenix Down

# Item - Elixir
# Description: Restore all HP and MP
# Price: 2500
![elixir](http://i.imgur.com/4eSbnLq.png) Elixir

# Item - Ether
# Description: Restore 100 MP
# Price: 1500
![Ether](http://i.imgur.com/qTOrm7K.png) Ether

# Item - Tent
# Description: Rest at inn
# Price: 500
![Tent](http://i.imgur.com/p71zGZh.png) Tent

# Item - Echo Screen
# Description: Nullify one unfinished task
# Price: 100
![echo-screen](http://i.imgur.com/OP63QET.png) Echo Screen

Habit Items:
![ether](http://i.imgur.com/vlaoeTu.png) Ether
![elixir](http://i.imgur.com/ny89GDp.png) Elixir
![phoenixdown](http://i.imgur.com/zPM0wR6.png) Phoenix Down

Tags:
:church: Sector 5 Church
:bamboo: Wutai Village
:house: Shinra Manor
:office: Shinra Headquarters
:rocket: Rocket Town
:shell: Forgotten Capital
:cactus: Cactus Island
:aerial_tramway: Gold Saucer

discussions.name: Better positioning for task columns in mobile layout
Not a big fan of recent changes

style_setting_options.label: Animate
style_setting_options.value: .current-pet{animation-duration:60s!important;-webkit-animation-name:boingg!important;animation-name:boingg!important;animation-delay:45s!important;animation-iteration-count:infinite}@keyframes boingg{0%,2.1%{transform:translateY(0) scaleX(1) scaleY(1)}1%{transform:translateY(8px) scaleY(0.9) scaleX(1.05)}1.5%{transform:translateY(-24px) scaleY(1.06) scaleX(1)}1.8%{transform:translateY(8px) scaleY(0.95) scaleX(1.2)}}.herobox span[class^="Mount_"],.herobox span[class^="current-mount Mount_Head_"]{animation-duration:80s!important;-webkit-animation-name:rawrr!important;animation-name:rawrr!important;animation-delay:0!important;animation-iteration-count:infinite}@keyframes rawrr{0%,7.5%{transform:rotate(0)}2.5%{transform:rotate(-.15deg) translateX(-2px) translateY(3px)}3.5%{transform:rotate(.1deg) translateX(-1px) translateY(4px)}}.herobox .character-sprites span[class^="weapon_"]{animation-duration:100s;animation-name:becareful;animation-iteration-count:infinite;animation-delay:57s!important}@keyframes becareful{1%,1.3%{transform:rotate(30deg);transform-origin:47px 68px}1.5%,1.6%{transform:rotate(-100deg) translateY(-4px);transform-origin:47px 68px}3%{transform:rotate(0);transform-origin:47px 68px}}.herobox .character-sprites span[class^="head_"]{animation-duration:28s;animation-name:twitchy;animation-iteration-count:infinite;animation-delay:19s!important}@keyframes twitchy{0%,3%{transform:skewX(0)}1.5%{transform:skewX(3deg)}2%{transform:skewX(-3deg)}2.3%{transform:skewX(3deg)}}

style_setting_options.label: Fantasy
style_setting_options.value: .toolbar-nav .toolbar-button-dropdown,.toolbar-nav .toolbar-button-dropdown.highlight,.toolbar-nav .toolbar-button-dropdown.highlight:hover,.toolbar-nav .toolbar-button-dropdown>a:first-of-type,.toolbar-nav .toolbar-button-dropdown>a:first-of-type:hover,.toolbar-nav .toolbar-button>a,.toolbar-nav .toolbar-button>a span,.toolbar-nav .toolbar-button>a:hover{border:0 solid!important;background:0 0!important}div#main{padding:0 196px 0 0}.toolbar-container{padding:0 12px}.toolbar-nav{white-space:inherit}.toolbar{width:202px}.toolbar-bailey,.toolbar-options,.toolbar-subscribe,.toolbar-wallet{float:left;margin:0 auto 10px;padding:0!important}.toolbar-nav .toolbar-button>a{width:145px;float:right;height:33px;padding:0!important}.toolbar-nav .toolbar-button-dropdown a.ng-scope+a,.toolbar-nav .toolbar-button-dropdown>a:first-of-type,.toolbar-nav .toolbar-button>a span{margin:0;padding:0 0 0 20px!important;width:auto;font-size:26px;font-family:'Roboto Condensed',sans-serif;font-weight:400!important;border:0 solid!important}.toolbar-nav .toolbar-button-dropdown a.ng-scope{bottom:3px;position:relative}.toolbar-nav .toolbar-button-dropdown>a:first-of-type{float:right}.toolbar-nav .toolbar-button>a span{padding:0 0 0 52px!important}.toolbar-nav .toolbar-button-dropdown>a:first-of-type span{font-weight:400!important}.header-wrap{padding:0}.toolbar-nav .toolbar-button-dropdown a.ng-scope+a+a,.toolbar-nav .toolbar-button-dropdown>a:nth-of-type(2){border-radius:.382em!important;margin-top:3px;border:0 solid transparent!important}.toolbar-nav .toolbar-button-dropdown a.ng-scope+a+a{float:left!important}.toolbar-nav .toolbar-button-dropdown.highlight>a:nth-of-type(2),.toolbar-nav .toolbar-button-dropdown>a:nth-of-type(2){border-left:0 solid rgba(208,208,208,0)!important}span.glyphicon.glyphicon-question-sign{display:none}li.toolbar-button{background:url(http://i.imgur.com/lUv6H07.png) 0 9px no-repeat;position:relative;right:6px}.toolbar-audio textarea,.toolbar-audio>a,.toolbar-audio>button,.toolbar-audio>input,.toolbar-nav .toolbar-button textarea,.toolbar-nav .toolbar-button-dropdown,.toolbar-nav .toolbar-button-dropdown textarea,.toolbar-nav .toolbar-button-dropdown.highlight,.toolbar-nav .toolbar-button-dropdown.highlight textarea,.toolbar-nav .toolbar-button-dropdown>button,.toolbar-nav .toolbar-button-dropdown>input,.toolbar-nav .toolbar-button>button,.toolbar-nav .toolbar-button>input,.toolbar-notifs textarea,.toolbar-notifs>a,.toolbar-notifs>button,.toolbar-notifs>input,.toolbar-settings textarea,.toolbar-settings>a,.toolbar-settings>button,.toolbar-settings>input,.toolbar-sync textarea,.toolbar-sync>a,.toolbar-sync>button,.toolbar-sync>input{border:0 solid rgba(208,208,208,0)!important;color:#fff!important}ul.toolbar-options{position:relative;left:12px}

style_setting_options.label: Fantasy
style_setting_options.value: .task-add textarea,.task-add>input,.task-add>input.task-add textarea:hover,.task-add>input:hover{border-radius:0!important;background:linear-gradient(to bottom,rgba(37,37,35,1) 20%,rgba(112,112,114,1) 50%)!important;color:#fff!important;box-shadow:2px 2px 0 0 rgba(0,0,0,.5),inset 2px 0 0 0 rgba(0,0,0,.3),inset 0 1px 0 0 rgba(0,0,0,.3),inset 0 -1px 0 0 rgba(225,225,225,.5);border-right:0 solid transparent!important;border-top:3px solid #f0f0f0!important;border-left:3px solid #c3c3c3!important;border-bottom:3px solid #ababab!important;text-shadow:2px 2px 0 rgba(0,0,0,.3)!important}.task-add>a,.task-add>button,.task-add>button:hover{border-radius:0!important;background:linear-gradient(to bottom,#a95454 0,#dac5c5 50%,#e36363 51%,#ab6b6b 100%)!important;box-shadow:2px 2px 0 0 rgba(0,0,0,.5),inset -2px 0 0 0 rgba(0,0,0,.3),inset 0 2px 0 0 rgba(0,0,0,.3),inset 0 -1px 0 0 rgba(225,225,225,.5);border-top:3px solid #f0f0f0!important;border-right:3px solid #c3c3c3!important;border-left:0 solid transparent!important;border-bottom:3px solid #ababab!important}.task-add .glyphicon{color:#f0f0f0!important;text-shadow:2px 2px 0 rgba(0,0,0,.3)!important;margin:0;padding:0;top:-3px}.task-add{margin-top:.2em}

style_setting_options.label: Basic
Fantasy
style_setting_options.value: .action-yesno label:after{height:.5em!important;width:.5em!important;font-size:3.4em!important;background:#181818;background:-moz-radial-gradient(center,ellipse cover,rgba(24,24,24,1) 0,rgba(24,24,24,1) 10%,rgba(53,53,53,1) 20%,rgba(24,24,24,1) 30%,rgba(24,24,24,1) 34%);background:-webkit-radial-gradient(center,ellipse cover,rgba(24,24,24,1) 0,rgba(24,24,24,1) 10%,rgba(53,53,53,1) 20%,rgba(24,24,24,1) 30%,rgba(24,24,24,1) 34%);background:radial-gradient(ellipse at center,rgba(24,24,24,1) 0,rgba(24,24,24,1) 10%,rgba(53,53,53,1) 20%,rgba(24,24,24,1) 34%,rgba(24,24,24,1) 30%);margin:0;opacity:1;border-radius:50%;border:3px ridge #D0D0D0;box-shadow:0 0 0 1px rgba(0,0,0,.4)}.action-yesno input[type=checkbox]:checked+label:after,.action-yesno label:hover:after{content:no-close-quote;margin:0;box-shadow:inset 3px 3px 7px 1px rgba(0,0,0,.7),inset 3px -3px 8px 2px rgba(255,255,255,.6),inset -2px -2px 4px 1px rgba(255,255,255,1)}.action-yesno input[type=checkbox]:checked+label:after{display:block;border-radius:50%;border:3px ridge;background:-moz-radial-gradient(center,ellipse cover,rgba(255,255,255,0) 0,rgba(255,255,255,0) 10%,rgba(255,255,255,.5) 20%,rgba(255,255,255,0) 30%,rgba(255,255,255,0) 100%);background:-webkit-radial-gradient(center,ellipse cover,rgba(255,255,255,0) 0,rgba(255,255,255,0) 10%,rgba(255,255,255,.5) 20%,rgba(255,255,255,0) 30%,rgba(255,255,255,0) 100%);background:radial-gradient(ellipse at center,rgba(255,255,255,0) 0,rgba(255,255,255,0) 10%,rgba(255,255,255,.5) 20%,rgba(255,255,255,0) 30%,rgba(255,255,255,0) 100%);opacity:1}.action-yesno label:hover:after{opacity:1!important;border:3px ridge;background:-moz-radial-gradient(center,ellipse cover,rgba(255,255,255,0) 0,rgba(255,255,255,0) 10%,rgba(255,255,255,.5) 20%,rgba(255,255,255,0) 30%,rgba(255,255,255,0) 100%);background:-webkit-radial-gradient(center,ellipse cover,rgba(255,255,255,0) 0,rgba(255,255,255,0) 10%,rgba(255,255,255,.5) 20%,rgba(255,255,255,0) 30%,rgba(255,255,255,0) 100%);background:radial-gradient(ellipse at center,rgba(255,255,255,0) 0,rgba(255,255,255,0) 10%,rgba(255,255,255,.5) 20%,rgba(255,255,255,0) 30%,rgba(255,255,255,0) 100%)}.completed .action-yesno label,.completed .task-action-btn{background-color:transparent;background:rgba(0,0,255,1)}.completed .action-yesno label:focus,.completed .action-yesno label:hover,.completed .task-action-btn:focus,.completed .task-action-btn:hover,.completed input[type=checkbox]:focus+label{background-color:transparent;background:rgba(255,255,255,.6)}.task-column:not(.rewards) .action-yesno label{border-radius:50%;margin:6px 4px;height:1.7em}.action-yesno input[type=checkbox]:checked+label:before,.action-yesno label:hover:before{position:absolute;height:4px!important;border-radius:50%;display:block;background:-moz-radial-gradient(center,ellipse cover,rgba(255,255,255,1) 0,rgba(255,255,255,0) 100%);background:-webkit-radial-gradient(center,ellipse cover,rgba(255,255,255,1) 0,rgba(255,255,255,0) 100%);background:radial-gradient(ellipse at center,rgba(255,255,255,1) 0,rgba(255,255,255,0) 100%);opacity:1;width:4px!important;left:11px;top:11px}
